token_info.name: SPEKTRUM (monochrome edition)
token_info.description: Created by Mikael Hvidtfeldt Christensen (@SyntopiaDK). A dynamic and generative piece. The OBJKT is generated based on the viewer's wallet ID. If the OBJKT has an orange border, it means the viewer could not be detected - try connecting your wallet. Clicking on the OBJKT will switch to preview mode, where random instances will be shown in a slideshow.  Tested on Win(FF,Chrome,Edge) and iOS & Android - please let me know if you encounter an environment where this breaks.
